info.author: elizabethperry
info.comment: This animated flower bloom responds to sound.PLEASE NOTE: This ONLY works if you download it and play it from your desktop.  Because it relies on your computer's microphone, it won't work in your browser...The colored circles (petals) move or grow along the x- or y-axis in response to the loudness of the room.
